Back to Franz Liszt

Franz Liszt

Szózat und Ungarischer Hymnus, S. 486

1873 · LW A261 · R. 158

[IMSLP]

This work is based on Szózat by Béni Egressy and the Hungarian national anthem by Ferenc Erkel. Liszt originally wrote it for orchestra (S. 353; LW G34; R. 448) and made arrangements for solo piano (S. 486; LW A261; R. 158) and piano duet (S. 628b).

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · I/16 · Z. A/B 8859 · Piano Versions of His Own Works II · ed. Imre Mező / Imre Sulyok

Duration: 8' 30"

Difficulty: 4
